00062         public function generateModuleCSV($records,$exportParams = array()) {
00063 
00064                 //require class for $this->csv
00065                 require_once("../../../Resources/PHP/csv.lib.php");
00066                 $data = array();
00067 
00068                 //build data array
00069                 foreach($records as $record) {
00070                         if(!is_array($record['params'])) {
00071                                 $record['params'] = array();
00072                         }
00073                         foreach($record['params'] as &$param) {
00074                                 if(is_array($param)) {
00075                                         $param = implode(";",$param);
00076                                 }
00077                         }
00078                         $data[] = $record['params'];
00079                 }
00080                 if(count($exportParams) > 0) {
00081                         foreach($data as &$params) {
00082                                 foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00083                                         if(!in_array($key,$exportParams)) {
00084                                                 unset($params[$key]);
00085                                         }
00086                                 }
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089 
00090                 //init csv object
00091                 $this->csv = new export2CSV(",","\n");
00092 
00093                 //generate file
00094                 $this->csv = $this->csv->create_csv_file($data);
00095                 header("Content-type: application/eml");
00096                 header("Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=mailformplusplus.csv");
00097                 echo $this->csv;
00098                 die();
00099         }
00100 
00109         function generateFrontendCSV($params,$exportParams = array()) {
00110                 //require class for $this->csv
00111                 require_once("typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/PHP/csv.lib.php");
00112 
00113                 //build data
00114                 foreach($params as $key=>&$value) {
00115                         if(is_array($value)) {
00116                                 $value = implode(",",$value);
00117                         }
00118                         if(count($exportParams) > 0 && !in_array($key,$exportParams)) {
00119                                 unset($params[$key]);
00120                         }
00121                         $value = str_replace('"','""',$value);
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 //init csv object
00125                 $this->csv = new export2CSV(",","\n");
00126                 $data[0] = $params;
00127 
00128                 //generate file
00129                 $this->csv = $this->csv->create_csv_file($data);
00130                 header("Content-type: application/eml");
00131                 header("Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=mailformplusplus.csv");
00132                 echo $this->csv;
00133                 die();
00134         }
00135 }
